conversation.content: Hi, I would like to check my miles balance.
Hello! Could you please provide your membership ID or email address associated with your account?
Sure, my membership ID is 123456789.
Thank you! Your current miles balance is 15,000 miles.
Great! When do my miles expire?
Your miles are set to expire on December 31, 2024. Make sure to use them before then!
Hey, can you tell me how many miles I have left?
Of course! May I have your account number or email address?
My email is user@example.com.
Thanks for the information. You have 8,500 miles remaining in your account.
Do you know when they'll expire?
Your miles will expire on June 30, 2025. Let us know if you need any help planning your next trip!
I'd like to see my miles balance.
Sure thing! Can you provide your frequent flyer number or registered email?
My frequent flyer number is ABC123.
Got it! You currently have 20,000 miles.
Awesome! When do they expire?
Your miles will not expire as long as there's activity in your account at least once every 18 months.
Can you check my miles balance and expiry date?
Certainly! Please provide your membership ID or email address.
Email: anotheruser@example.com.
Thank you. Your account shows a balance of 5,000 miles.
And when do they expire?
Your miles will expire on March 31, 2023. You might want to use them soon!
How many miles do I have, and are they expiring soon?
Certainly! Can you provide your membership number or registered email?
My membership number is 987654321.
Thank you. Your current balance is 12,000 miles.
What about their expiry date?
Your miles are due to expire on September 30, 2024. Make sure to use them before the expiry date!
